General.Name: Abico FS Co Ltd
General.Description: ABICO NetCom Co.,Ltd. operates as a pre-recorded disk manufacturing company. The company manufactures and trades in mechanical parts, metal stamping and plastic injection molds, sports goods, and contact lens, as well as sells material electronic components, film, and music agents. It also manufactures gear related powder metallurgy, power tool gear box, and assembly products. ABICO NetCom Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 27, Kanging Street, New Taipei City, Taiwan
